alert.note: Alert for Belmont; Carroll; Columbiana; Coshocton; Guernsey; Harrison; Jefferson; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 12:33PM EDT until April 01 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM EDT FOR HARRISON...SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...NORTHWESTERN COLUMBIANA... GUERNSEY...SOUTHEASTERN COSHOCTON...CARROLL...BELMONT...TUSCARAWAS AND MARSHALL COUNTIES... At 1232 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Barberton to near Newcomerstown, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... New Philadelphia, Dover, Cambridge, Uhrichsville, St. Clairsville, Barnesville, Cadiz, Carrollton, Freeport, Newcomerstown, Minerva, and Dennison. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.

area.areaDesc: Belmont; Carroll; Columbiana; Coshocton; Guernsey; Harrison; Jefferson; Tuscarawas
